title: Data Science Intern
description: Applied Epistemic Network Analysis (ENA) to model and quantify collaborative discourse patterns across large-scale educational datasets.
Designed and implemented Python-based data pipelines for cleaning, transforming, and integrating qualitative and quantitative data sources.
Developed interactive data visualizations to communicate findings on equity, participation, and role distribution within cross-institutional teams.
Performed statistical modeling and graph-based network analysis to identify drivers of effective team communication and collaboration.
Collaborated with faculty researchers to translate analytical results into actionable recommendations for improving team structures and processes.
